ctx: intros net h h' H_ref H_type H_pred.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 6 branches.

original: intros net h h' H_ref H_type H_pred. destruct H_ref as [base_ptrs [params_ptrs RIR]]. destruct RIR. - simpl in H_pred. congruence. - specialize (handleInput h' h inp (snd (nwState net h))). intros H_handle H_update. specialize (RIR_handleInput net h inp gd out d l ps' st' H_ref H_handle H_update). apply H_pred.
